LanguageData.GW_StudySTCFragmentsDescription: Study STC fragments to unlock lost technologies.
LanguageData.GW_StudyFragmentsDialogTitle: Study STC Fragments to discover projects for your colonists to research
LanguageData.GW_StudyCompleteMessage:
{0} has studied long lost fragments of Imperial technology and found they contain the blueprints for {1}.

Your colony can now attempt to decode these blueprints to gain what was lost.




The research project {1} is now available to reserach at a research bench (provided all other pre-requisites have been met).
